name: Klondike Forever
summary: Enjoy everyone's favourite solitaire game, with a simple graphic interface. Rich graphics and smooth animation enhance your game-play experience in 3D. Features include cards that move and flip in 3D space, unlimited undo/redo, statistics, auto-move options, reveal playable cards, multiple card decks and card backs, and full screen and windowed modes. Enjoy all the features of it's big brother, Solitaire Forever. This is solitaire on a whole new level.
